name: Promoted to King
description:
Promoted to King is a RogueLike chess game.

Climb your way defeating different enemies, each with unique boards and reach the final boss (which is currently under development). 

This game features most of the classic chess rules, however there are 3 new characteristics:

  1. The board may not be 8x8. Some enemies will live in boards of different sizes or shapes.
  2. Piece selection. Don't like playing with bishops? Then don't. You decide what pieces go into your board thanks to the point reward system. If you want to charge the battlefield with 17 pawns, go ahead.
  3. Magic! You can't defeat a kingdom by mere hand, so we offer you a set of 8 magic skills that will help you in your strategies.

This game is designed so that anyone can play it, you don't need to be a Grand Master chess player to win, you just need to know the basic rules and learn how to use the tools that are offered.
